subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Andy Roddick withstood a second-set rally to win the Brisbane International, beating the defending champion Radek Stepanek, who double-faulted on championship point.
snippet: Top-seeded Andy Roddick withstood a second-set rally to win the Brisbane International, beating the defending champion Radek Stepanek, who double-faulted on championship point.
